item.title: Basic configuration for Jetty and tomcat maven plugins
item.description: This is a quick memento on how to set up tomcat7-maven-plugin and jetty-maven plugin (current version is 8). It is interesting to note both of these servers are servlet 3.0 compatible. Setting up Jetty : Now your can run mvn jetty:run To set up tomcat-7 plugin, you will have to add either the plugin to the pluginManagement section of your pom (more portable) - see below - or adding the pluginGroup to your settings.
